description:
In 1998, monsters were formally removed from human natural enemies, and it was no longer legal to hunt monsters. In 2010, the law recognized the humanoid status of monsters and enjoyed all the rights of human beings without changing their original form. Zhao Xixi’s parents are the backbone of the anti-youkai organization, so Zhao Xixi has been educated since he was a child, and never be friends with monsters—
“They can eat children, and disobedient children will be eaten by them!” The more beautiful the monsters are, the more they deceive!” “We are different from them!” “When we see the monsters, we have to hide away!” However, unexpectedly, Dad sent her to kindergarten because she was too busy. Directly sent Xiao Xixi into the monster cub garden next door…>
